field.name: ParentAchievement
field.comment: Achievement.dbc, its Achievement parent (can`t start while parent uncomplete, use its Criteria if don`t have own, use its progress on begin)

field.name: Count
field.comment: need this count of completed criterias (own or referenced achievement criterias)

field.name: RefAchievement
field.comment: Achievement.dbc, referenced achievement (counting of all completed criterias)

field.name: timerStartEvent
field.comment: for timed spells it is spell id, for timed kills it is creature id

field.name: Zone
field.comment: if 0 then it's zone, else it's zone id of this area
